faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Buying House in Sector 86 Gurugram
faqSection.description: We address the most common queries potential homebuyers have regarding investment living and legalities in Sector 86 to ensure clarity and confidence in your decision making process.

faqs.question: What types of properties are available if I want to buy house in Sector 86 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Sector 86 offers a broad range of residential properties catering to varied demands. You can find ready-to-move-in independent houses spacious residential plots for custom construction premium builder floors and high-end apartments within integrated townships. The house options typically range from 3 BHK to 6 BHK villas ensuring large family accommodation is easily available for buyers.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 86 to major parts of Delhi NCR
faqs.answer: Connectivity is arguably the strongest selling point for Sector 86. It lies adjacent to the Dwarka Expressway providing direct and fast access to Dwarka and IGI Airport. Additionally its proximity to NH 48 ensures quick routes to Cyber City Manesar and the central business districts of Gurugram. The planned metro extension in the vicinity further promises enhanced future connectivity.

faqs.question: Are there any reputed schools and hospitals close to Sector 86
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 86 is surrounded by well-regarded educational institutions including St Xaviers High School DPS and several international schools ensuring quality education options are available within a short driving distance. For healthcare facilities renowned hospitals like Aarvy Healthcare and Medanta are easily accessible providing comprehensive medical services to residents.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for buying an independent house in Sector 86
faqs.answer: The pricing for independent houses in Sector 86 varies significantly based on plot size configuration development stage and proximity to the main road. Generally prices start from Rs 2 Crore for smaller builder floors on 4 Marla plots and can range up to Rs 6 Crore or more for large luxury villas on 10 Marla plots or larger. It is essential to consult with a local real estate expert for the most current market valuation.

faqs.question: Is Sector 86 considered a good investment location for future returns
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 86 is highly regarded for its strong investment potential particularly post the full operationalization of the Dwarka Expressway. Its placement within New Gurugram’s growth corridor ensures steady appreciation in property values driven by infrastructural improvements and increasing demand from professionals working in the nearby corporate hubs.

faqs.question: Are the plots available in Sector 86 freehold or leasehold properties
faqs.answer: The majority of residential plots and houses available for sale in Sector 86 Gurugram are sold on a freehold basis allowing the buyer complete ownership rights over the land and structure. However it is always crucial to verify the specific title deed and legal status of any property before finalizing the purchase agreement to ensure clear ownership.

faqs.question: What security features are typically offered in residential complexes in Sector 86
faqs.answer: Most premium residential complexes and independent plotted developments prioritize resident safety. Standard security features include multi-tier security systems 24/7 professional guards controlled entry and exit points CCTV surveillance across common areas and smart home security integration in newer houses for comprehensive protection.

faqs.question: What is the status of utility services like water and electricity in Sector 86 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Sector 86 being a part of New Gurugram benefits from modern municipal planning. It enjoys reliable access to water supply managed by the municipal corporation and robust electricity infrastructure with minimal power outages often supported by power backup systems within residential societies and independent houses.

faqs.question: Can Non-Resident Indians NRI buy residential property in Sector 86 easily
faqs.answer: Yes Non-Resident Indians are legally permitted to buy both residential and commercial properties in Sector 86 Gurugram without needing prior permission from the RBI except for certain agricultural land types. The process is streamlined but requires adherence to FEMA regulations and proper documentation including PAN card and proof of NRI status.

faqs.question: What are the local civic amenities available to residents of Sector 86
faqs.answer: Residents benefit from well-maintained local amenities including planned parks and green spaces dedicated jogging tracks and reliable street lighting. The sector is also evolving rapidly with convenience stores local markets and specialized service providers ensuring daily needs are met within the neighborhood itself complementing the larger retail centers nearby.
